mapper.insert: replace into incinfo.acdnt_info (type, eventType, eventDetailType, startDate, coordX, coordY, linkId, roadName, roadNo, roadDrcType, lanesBlockType, lanesBlocked, message, endDate) values (#{type}, #{eventType}, #{eventDetailType}, #{startDate}, #{coordX}, #{coordY}, #{linkId}, #{roadName}, #{roadNo}, #{roadDrcType}, #{lanesBlockType}, #{lanesBlocked}, #{message}, #{endDate})
